name: Rust Rails
description:
RESOURCE COLLECTION AND CRAFT

On your journey, you will encounter various resources from which you can create weapons, armor, various items, or exchange them with a merchant.
Be careful, the space in your backpack is not endless, you will have to choose what to take with you and what to leave.

EVERY ADVENTURE WILL BE UNIQUE

The Roguelike system will make each race unique, a procedurally generated map, dungeons, train stations, loot will not let you get bored!

BATTLE SYSTEM

The weapons have unique mechanics - homing missiles, an energy ball, ballistic projectiles, and maybe ninja frogs...? Moreover, each projectile has its own type of damage - Normal, Energy, Frost, Fire, Poison. Weapons with different damage types pair well or poorly with active artifacts!

WORLD EXPLORATION

Random encounters with peaceful characters, secret rooms, riddles, dialogues will help you learn the history of this world.
